# leanspace_leaf_space_ground_station_links (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform

  leafspace_ground_station_id = "d5de2269dc23179929546f41b6239afb"
  leanspace_ground_station_id = "969e157d-8883-43cd-b851-3d7ff3449ec6"

}
```
